column1: 10/10 - Great job identifying the Production function as a suitable candidate for scrum/sprint methodologies and providing specific examples of how it could be implemented. Keep up the good work!

Rating: 12 pts

Comment: Excellent job! You provided a clear and complete description of how scrum/sprint could operate for the chosen business function. Keep up the good work!

7 pts - Some vagueness or incompleteness in discussion of fit.

Comment: Good attempt in explaining why kanban may not be the best fit for the production function. However, it would be helpful to provide more specific examples or reasons related to the function itself. Keep up the good work!

10/10 - Great job identifying the marketing function as a suitable area for implementing kanban methodologies and providing a clear explanation of how it could operate in this context. Keep up the good work!
12 pts - Very complete and clear description of how kanban could operate. Great job on providing specific details and examples for the marketing function. Keep up the good work!
7 pts: Good job discussing the poor fit of scrum/sprint for the marketing function, but it could be more specific to Mighty Jaxx's context. Keep up the good work!
5 pts - You have clearly identified confirmation bias as a relevant issue for Jackson's decision-making process and provided actionable steps to avoid it. Great job!
10/10 - Excellent job defining confirmation bias and providing steps to avoid it. Keep up the good work!

Rating: 10/10

Comment: Great job! Your description is reasonable, but could use a bit more detail in some areas. Keep up the good work!
10 pts - Great job! You provided clear and detailed descriptions of possible steps and actions for implementing scrum/sprint and kanban methodologies. Keep up the good work!
